weltengreif / 05.02.2017 / gefundenWith the rest of the family on a well-deserved holiday weekend, I teamed up with Fl0ydt and headed to "sober" Neukirchen-Vluyn in order to grab a couple of challenges as well as some solved mysteries. The weather gave the lie to the forecast, and we were treated to a dry, even sunny stroll around the fields. With bus connections proving pretty rare, we soon headed back to Duisburg, where we one or two interesting caches. All in all, it was - apart from two DNS, one of which was due to a group of very drunk and annoying carnival revellers - a pretty successful day, and, since Fl0ydt was doing a lot of the navigating, also pretty relaxed.Went across first, then back as we zoomed in on the GPSr. Quick one.TFTC & greets from "Blade City" Solingen!Cache #6195 (approx.)Found on 5.
